title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4052.5 - Character, dimensions of fences, hurdles
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4052.5 - Character, dimensions of fences, hurdles

State Regulations

The fences in steeplechase courses and the hurdles in
the hurdle courses shall be of such character and dimensions as may be
certified by the stewards of the National Steeplechase and Hunt Association to
the commission for approval. At meetings sanctioned by the hunts committee the
jumps may be of such character and dimensions as may be approved by the hunts
committee and certified to the commission for approval. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4052.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
